import {React, useState, Fragment, useEffect} from 'react' import classnames from 'classnames' import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import PerfectScrollbar from 'react-perfect-scrollbar' import { Mail, Send, Edit2, Star, Info, Trash, Search} from 'react-feather' import * as Icon from 'react-feather' import { Button, ListGroup, ListGroupItem, Badge, Media, Col, Row, Modal, ModalHeader, ModalBody, ModalFooter, InputGroup, InputGroupText} from 'reactstrap' import Typography from '@material-ui/core/Typography' import InputAdornment from "@material-ui/core/InputAdornment" import TextField from "@material-ui/core/TextField" import SearchIcon from "@material-ui/icons/Search" import Input from '@material-ui/core/Input' import InputLabel from '@material-ui/core/InputLabel' import FormControl from '@material-ui/core/FormControl' const renderModal = () => { return (
toggleModal(3)} className='modal-dialog-centered' modalClassName="modal-success" key={3} > {/* toggleModal(3)}> */}
